items.sentence: I gave you an extra hour and you still didn\'t finish the job.
I guess it\'s impossible for me to learn how to play the oboe.
I have no time for that, and besides, I don\'t have any money.
I have a cat and a dog. The cat is black and the dog is white.
Three months before Tom was to graduate from college, he died.
Tom drops his kids off at school on his way to work every day.
Tom told Mary that he wasn\'t planning to go swimming with us.
My New Year\'s resolution is to learn how to play the ocarina.
French isn\'t as hard to learn as a lot of people think it is.
Tom is in college, but his girlfriend is still in high school.
